title: Capture elements in hybrid Android apps in Katalon Studio
description: Katalon Mobile Recorder/Spy utility can detect elements in   hybrid app rendered as native app, but cannot as Webview. This   tutorial provides a solution to capture Android hybrid mobile   elements in WebView with Appium and Chrome Devtools. You can learn   more about Android WebView functionalities from the Android   developer documentation here: WebView.

frontMatter.title: Capture elements in hybrid Android apps in Katalon Studio
